resources.name: Register
resources.description: Register as an admin. Only invited persons can perform this request.

resources.name: Login
resources.description: Login as an admin

resources.name: Register
resources.description: Create a new account passing in all the required details.

resources.name: Login
resources.description: Log in a user using email and password. This endpiint should not be used in a frontend implementation. Please contact the developer for more details.

resources.name: Send Password Reset Email
resources.description: Request for an email containing link to reset user's password (i.e change password). Users must be logged in to make this request.

resources.name: Send Forgot Password Email
resources.description: Request for an email containing link to reset user's password (forgot password). Request can be made without logging in.

resources.name: Create User
resources.description: Add a new user's record. Only admins can call this endpoint.

resources.name: Get Users
resources.description: Get a list of registered users. Only admins can make this request.

resources.name: Get User
resources.description: Get a user's profile details. Users must be logged in to make this request.

resources.name: Update User
resources.description: Update a user's profile details. All details for registrations can be updated except email and password. Users must be logged in to make this request.

resources.name: Delete User
resources.description: Delete a user using it's uid, passed in as path params. Only admins can make this request.

resources.name: Upload User Profile Photo
resources.description: Upload user's profile photo. Users must be logged in to make this request.

resources.name: Save User Search Query
resources.description: Save user's search queries. Users must be logged in to make this request.

resources.name: Change User to Host
resources.description: Change a user account to a host account. Host accounts will be able to manage their events. The user needs to be logged in to do this.

resources.name: Create Event
resources.description: Add a new event (concert). Only admins can make this request.

resources.name: Get Events
resources.description: Get a list of all events (concerts)

resources.name: Update Event
resources.description: Update an event using it's uid, specified as a path parameter. This endpoint can be used to archive an event by adding 'isArchived' field in the form data and setting it's value to true. Only admins cam make this request.

resources.name: Delete Event
resources.description: Delete an event using it's uid, passed in via the URl. Only admins can make this request.

resources.name: Like Or Unlike Event
resources.description: Like or unlike an event using it's uid, passed in via the URl. Only logged in users can make this request.

resources.name: Approve Event
resources.description: Approve an event created by a user who is not an admin. Events created by non-admin users will need approval in order to be visible to the public. Only admins can make this request.

resources.name: Get Creator Events
resources.description: Get events added by an authorised event creator (admin or host) using the creatorId passed in as a path parameter. You need to be logged in to make this request.

resources.name: Create (Add) Question for an Event
resources.description: Create or add a question for an existing event. Only authorized users can perform this action.

resources.name: Get Question
resources.description: Get a single question using it's uid, passed in as a path parameter.

resources.name: Update Question
resources.description: Update an existing question using it's uid, passed in as a path parameter.

resources.name: Delete Question
resources.description: Delete a question specified by it's uid, passed in as a path parameter.

resources.name: Get Event Quiz
resources.description: Get quiz associated with an event. The quiz questions are randomly selected from the backend. You must be logged in to see the quiz.

resources.name: Submit Event Quiz Answers
resources.description: Submit user's answers to an event's quiz using the event id, passed in as a path parameter. You must have made payment to be able to answer the associated questions. Note that a user can only take an event quiz once.

resources.name: Get Event Quiz Winners
resources.description: Get the winners of an event quiz. You must be logged in to see the winners.

resources.name: Create Invite
resources.description: Invite an account to register as a privileged user (e.g admin). Only authorized admins can send an invite.

resources.name: Get Invites
resources.description: Get a list of all invites. Only admins can view all invites.

resources.name: Get Invite
resources.description: Get a single invite using it's uid, passed in as a path parameter. Only admins can view an invite.

resources.name: Delete Invite
resources.description: Delete an invite specified by it's uid, passed in as a path parameter. Only admins can delete an invite.

resources.name: Handle Paystack Ticket Payment
resources.description: Handle ticket payment made via paystack and create payment record on the backend. The 'objective' field must be either "to buy" or "to play game".

resources.name: Handle Stripe Ticket Payment
resources.description: Handle ticket payment made via stripe and create payment record on the backend. The 'objective' field must be either "to buy" or "to play game".

resources.name: Create Raffle Draw
resources.description: Create a raffle draw for an existing event. Only authorized users can perform this action.

resources.name: Get Raffle Draw
resources.description: Get a raffle draw using it's uid, passed in as a path parameter.

resources.name: Update Raffle Draw
resources.description: Update an existing raffle draw using it's uid, passed in as a path parameter.

resources.name: Delete Raffle Draw
resources.description: Delete a raffle draw specified by it's uid, passed in as a path parameter.

resources.name: Get Event Raffle Draw
resources.description: Get raffle draw associated with an event. You must be logged in to see the raffle draw.

resources.name: Submit Event Raffle Draw Choice
resources.description: Submit user choice for an event raffle draw. You must be logged in to see the raffle draw.

resources.name: Get Event Raffle Draw Winners
resources.description: Get the winners of an event raffle draw. You must be logged in to see the winners.

resources.name: Get User Acquired Tickets
resources.description: Get all tickets acquired by a user using user uid passed in as a path parameter. You must be logged in to make this request.
